GSD.description:
xen/netfront: fix leaking data in shared pages

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.53 by commit 5dd0993c36832d33820238fc8dc741ba801b7961. For more details please see the references link.
